about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to have an attractive girl dancing on your screen while you are doing something at the computer?

With the game Desktop Sex Doll it is quite possible. You can make her such that you will like it, dress her in different outfits or leave her without it 😉, choose a dance that will turn you on.

With the help of additional games you can gradually open up new possibilities in the behavior of your doll, and by turning on your favorite music in the background you can even dance with her 🤩

Features:
  • Different styles of the heroine's dance
  • A large selection of settings for the heroine
  • Minigames
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Desktop Sex Doll

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Desktop Sex Doll is a game for those who just want to relax and enjoy a nice and unobtrusive dance of a girl on their computer desktop. You can even make the girl dance on the documents you have just made, without doing any harm to them, but we do not recommend it in the office. 😉
supported_languages:
